product_families.family_name: Polythene Insulated Jelly Filled Armoured Copper Telecom Cables
product_families.high_level_description: Armoured multi-pair copper cables with Polythene Insulation and Petroleum Jelly filling for moisture protection, double helical galvanized steel tape armouring, and Polythene outer jacket. Primarily for telecommunication infrastructure.

variant_specific_constraints: Units Group Twinning: 200P contains 4 units of 50P
Diameter over sheath: Shall not exceed 37.5mm
Units Group Twinning: 100P contains 5 units of 20P
Diameter over sheath: Shall not exceed 28mm
Units Group Twinning: 50P contains 5 units of 10P
Diameter over sheath: Shall not exceed 22mm
Units Group Twinning: 20P contains 1 unit of 20P
Diameter over sheath: Shall not exceed 17mm
Units Group Twinning: 10P contains 1 unit of 10P
Diameter over sheath: Shall not exceed 11mm

common_technical_characteristics.conductor: Solid Annealed high conductive Copper, 0.5mm diameter, Solid-Circular shape. Insulation to contain anti-oxidant/copper inhibitor.
common_technical_characteristics.insulation: Polythene insulating grade, Dielectric constant max 2.35, Min tensile strength 100 kg/cm², Min elongation 300%.
common_technical_characteristics.sheath: Polythene grade (BS 6234 compliant), containing suitable anti-oxidant. Min thickness (excluding poly-Al laminate) not less than 75% of nominal specified. Min tensile strength 70kg/cm², Min elongation 300%. Outer jacket material is Solid Polythene (BS 6234 compliant) with minimum thickness 1.4mm.
special_properties: Filling Compound: Petroleum Jelly (compatible with polythene insulation, binders, tapes; homogenous, uniformly mixed, anti-oxidant, water-resistant, free from dirt/metallic particles/foreign matter).
Core Wrapping: Closed helical or longitudinal lapping of non-hygroscopic and non-wicking polyester tape, impregnated or flooded with jelly.
Moisture Barrier Screen: Polythene coated aluminum tape, applied longitudinally with minimum 3mm overlap. Thickness 0.3mm + 15%.
Bedding Tape: Polythene tape or polypropylene tape, applied helically over the sheath.
Binder Tape Colors: Blue, Orange, Green, Brown, Grey.
Packing: Strong wooden drums. Cable ends sealed with rubber/PVC caps. Hot stamping with SDSC SHAR stamp at ends. Specific drum and sheath markings required. Sheath marking intervals at one meter.

non_negotiable_constraints: Spark Test Dielectric Strength (Conductor to Conductor): 2.4 KV DC for 3 Sec.
Spark Test Dielectric Strength (Conductor to Shield): 5.0 KV DC for 3 Sec.
Insulation Resistance (Conductor to Conductor/Shield): Min 5000 MΩ-KM at 500 V DC-1 Min.
Dielectric Strength of Sheath: 17KV dc or 11KV RMS ac (for sheath thickness 2.0 to 2.4mm).
Equal Level Far End Cross Talk at 150KHz: Better than 55dB/Km (individual value).
Near End Cross Talk at 150KHz: Better than 55dB/Km (individual value).

electrical_tests: Dielectric strength (High voltage) between conductors test
Dielectric strength (High voltage) between all conductors and shield test
Equal level far end cross talk test
mechanical_tests: Elongation and tensile strength of conductor insulation test
Elongation and tensile strength of sheath test
Variation between the maximum and minimum diameter over sheath at any cross section test
fire_or_environmental_tests: Volume resistivity of petroleum jelly test
testing_and_quality_expectations.inspection_requirements: Pre-Delivery inspection at factory site/online video mode as per standard Quality Assurance Plan, with clearance from SDSC SHAR's Pre-Delivery inspection team required before dispatch. Minimum 50% of the ordered quantity shall be tested with the presence of SDSC SHAR authorities.

engineering_complexity_indicators: Complex multi-layer construction including jelly filling and moisture barrier.
Strict electrical performance parameters for high-frequency telecom applications (capacitance, crosstalk, attenuation).
Adherence to specific material properties for insulation and sheathing.
Precision manufacturing for critical dimensions and overlaps.
validation_required_before_commitment: Demonstrated compliance to DOT TEC GR/CUG-01/03 Aug 2003 and BS 6234 standards.
Full adherence to specified electrical, mechanical, and material test results.
OEM manufacturing experience of at least 5 years.
Certification as an authorized dealer/agent for the OEM.
Documentary evidence of prior experience with similar supplies.
assumed_standard_if_not_flagged: General industry best practices for robust telecom cable manufacturing.

product_families.high_level_description: Armoured multi-pair copper cables with Extruded Polyethylene insulation, galvanized steel round wire armouring, and Fire Retardant Low Smoke (FRLS) PVC inner and outer sheaths. Designed for environments requiring enhanced fire safety.

common_technical_characteristics.conductor: Solid annealed Bare copper conductor as per IS:8130 (Single strand), Electrolytic grade, 0.5mm diameter, Solid-circular shape.
common_technical_characteristics.insulation: Extruded Polyethylene. Lay length of twisted pair ≤ 80mm. Color coding as per Table-2 of GR/WIR 06/03. Mar 2002.
common_technical_characteristics.armouring: G S Round wire (IS: 3975), Single layer, ≥ 0.9 mm diameter.
common_technical_characteristics.sheath: Inner sheath: PVC type ‘TM-2 as per IS:13176 or ST1 as per IS:5831’. Outer sheath: Extruded FRLS PVC type- TM-2 as per IS:13176 or ST1 as per IS:5831’.
special_properties: FRLS (Fire Retardant Low Smoke) properties for outer sheath.
Drum marking as per TEC GR document.

non_negotiable_constraints: High Voltage Test: 2KV RMS for 1 minute.
Capacitance Unbalance (Pair to Pair): Shall not exceed 230PF.
Flammability Test: Must pass IEC-332 Part-1.
Smoke Density Rating: Maximum 60% as per ASTM D2843.

testing_and_quality_expectations.inspection_requirements: Pre-Delivery inspection at factory site/online video mode as per standard Quality Assurance Plan, with clearance from SDSC SHAR's Pre-Delivery inspection team required before dispatch. Minimum 50% of the ordered quantity shall be tested with the presence of SDSC SHAR authorities.

engineering_complexity_indicators: Compliance with stringent FRLS properties and associated fire safety standards (IEC-332 Part-1, ASTM D2843).
Adherence to specific material and construction standards (IS:8130, IS:3975, IS:13176/IS:5831).
Precision manufacturing for critical dimensions and electrical performance.
validation_required_before_commitment: Demonstrated compliance to GR/WIR 06/03. Mar 2002 and associated material/performance standards.
Full adherence to specified electrical and fire safety test results.
OEM manufacturing experience of at least 5 years.
Certification as an authorized dealer/agent for the OEM.
Documentary evidence of prior experience with similar supplies.
assumed_standard_if_not_flagged: General industry best practices for fire-safe cable manufacturing.
